import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) return () => clearTimeout(timer) // This is the cleanup function }, []) return ( <>
